claims.object: Integrated protein and transcriptome spatial profiling
overcoming challenges in integrating spatial transcriptomics and proteomics

surface_layer.definition: A method that integrates protein and transcriptome spatial profiling.
common_uses: Integration of spatial transcriptomics and proteomics data

deep_layer.mechanism: Combines spatial information about proteins and RNA to provide a more complete picture of biological processes.
deep_layer.origin: Developed to address the limitations of analyzing spatial transcriptomics and proteomics data separately.

citations: Integrated protein and transcriptome spatial profiling - PMC
